Great, clear clips BTW, Juli!

Robin

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: juli velazquez<mailto:ghostchasingfool@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 06, 2=
008 8:57 AM
  Subject: Re: for frank RRRR Re: [EVP-ITC] All these year!?


=

  Frank,
               I have to agree with you on this.  I have attached=
 some clips where I ask what my roll is.  They advised me of several things=
.  Some of the key words are in the clips and the fact that they acknowledg=
e we need proof is amazing to me.  The tec's as well call them are reflecte=
d in the last clip when I asked if I should do a session.  A female say no,=
 and then proceeds to response "you will see".  For whatever its worth, if =
I get some sort of direction as a response, I comply (by choice and in reas=
on).  I can't help but wonder if sometimes they don't have a best interest =
at heart?  Whether they do or not, this is extremely exciting to me, and co=
unt my blessing everyday that I am was lead on this path and will continue =
to follow where ever it takes me.

  Juli

             

  Frank Ratka <wa=
rrior18eii@...> wrote: 
    I don't mind telling you. I know this thr=
ough a combination of trusted researchers messages that have been confirmed=
 by my own messages. This viewpoint is also shared by many of the "pioneers=
" and their miraculous contacts of the 80's and 90's. The words such as tec=
h, gatekeeper, facilitator, or whatever may change but the function remains=
 the same. Don't get caught up in the semantics. LOL

    If you are lookin=
g for proof, ask your heart what is real. 

    Regards,

    Frank R.


  =
  ----- Original Message ----
    From: Ron Lederer <ronriko@...>
   =
 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    Sent: Wednesday, February 6, 2008 9:35:05 =
AM
    Subject: Re: for frank RRRR Re: [EVP-ITC] All these year!?


    Hey=
, thanks Frank R, I'm glad I asked.  Now I want to ask how you know all thi=
s, but I'm not going to.  I will work a bit to digest what you just told me=
.  Cheers   Ron L

    Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com<http://yahoo.co=
m/>> wrote: 
      Sure, I was just being considerate. Didn't want to butt =
in... he he A bridge or contact bridge is a link between you and other enti=
ties. Not just spirits who have transitioned but also living entities. You =
can form a bridge with the help of other researchers and colleagues on the =
other side of the veil. This is the link you communicate over! A contact fi=
eld is the field each of us generate to make that link. It is controlled by=
 our desire to make contact. Both concepts will grow in strength and weaken=
 depending on the resonance or harmony you share with others in the bridge.=


      The technicians or techs that Bruce and others like to call them ar=
e facilitators or gatekeepers. They control the window or gate when contact=
 is made or the bridge is activated. A lot of the time you may not even kno=
w who they are. My primary guide and gatekeeper does not want to be identif=
ied, which is apparent in the message I received when I asked: "It is not i=
mportant, just know that I love you very much". That is the answer I got wh=
en I asked who my primary facilitator was.

      I say primary because the=
re seems to be more than one who will operate the "gate". I catch chatter a=
ll the time asking who is on the gate or who is operating the gate and so o=
n. Some are more forceful and controlling than others and some are more lib=
eral on who they let through. Just know it is okay to ask them to limit who=
 is let through, how you would like them to speak (clearly and one at a tim=
e) or how you want to be addressed.

      Regards,

      Frank R.


     =
 ----- Original Message ----
      From: Ron Lederer <ronriko@yahoo. com>
 =
     To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
      Sent: Wednesday, February 6, 2008 9=
:05:54 AM
      Subject: Re: for frank and frankRe: [EVP-ITC] All these yea=
r!?


      Didn't mean to be exclusive... I would be interested in your de=
finition if you can take a moment to explain.  LOL Ron L

      Frank Ratka=
 <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com<http://yahoo.com/>> wrote: 
        At first I th=
ought you were talking to me. I was about to tell you what a contact bridge=
 was and a contact field. I'll let Sumption do it. LOL

        Frank R.


=
        ----- Original Message ----
        From: Ron Lederer <ronriko@yaho=
o. com>
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
        Sent: Wednesday, Febru=
ary 6, 2008 6:51:57 AM
        Subject: for frankRe: [EVP-ITC] All these ye=
ar!?


        Any idea what "the bridge" signifies in this message?  I hav=
e a connection to that term.  
         Ron L

        Frank Sumption <purp=

          Guess I'm still l=
earning, and mostly form others here. Bruce claims evryone has a 'technicai=
n' assigned. I dind';t thinjk much of that idea, but it appears i have my o=
wn as well. 
           
           "Nancy Will match up the bridge" and "T=
alking 8(?)-I talk to you"
